text: Evelyn Venable (October 18, 1913 - November 15, 1993) was an American actress. She performed as the Blue Fairy in Pinocchio, a 1940 movie. She also played the mother of Shirley Temple in the movie The Little Colonel. Venable was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. She died from cancer in Idaho, aged eighty. == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Cincinnati Category:American movie actors Category:Cancer deaths in Idaho Category:1913 births Category:1993 deaths
title: Evelyn Venable
